ISSUE.TITLE: Wrong validation on dates when using language 'nb-NO' on a linux web app in azure
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.6 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Host solution on a linux web app in azure 2. Choose Norwegian language nb-NO 3. Press button 'Set CLDR for current culture' 4. Go to product 5. Select product valid from and a date 6. Save 7. See error on top "The value '03.01.2023 00.00' is not valid for **Tilgjengelig startdato**."
